oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: General orders on wearing insignia
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: General Order No. 26 entitling Cpl. Garrett to wear two War Service Chevrons after November 10, 1918, dated Nov. 8, 1918. Second order authorizing Cpl. Garrett to wear First Army and Third Corps insignia, but not at the same time. Garrett worked in the 90th Aero Squadron repairing, installing, and maintaining the radios in the planes and the radio station.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
